content: decoy hornets nest tis but a stitch you will need ● a skein of natural color yarn bulky weight i used tan and brown worsted double stranded ● 6 5mm to 7mm crochet hook ● plastic bags think store bags you could also use polyfil if you d like ● scissors ● tapestry needle 1 abbreviations chain-chain mc- magic_ring st-stitch single_crochet- single_crochet double_crochet- double_crochet increase- increase decrease- decrease bpdc- back post double_crochet pattern **pattern worked in rounds** 1 create a mc 6 single_crochet in the ring 2 double_crochet increase in each stitch around 12 3 double_crochet increase* 18 4 bpdc in each st 18 5 dcx2 increase* 24 6 bpdc in each st 24 2 7 dcx2 increase* 32 8 bpdc in each st 32 9 double_crochet increase* 48 10 bpdc in each st 48 11 double_crochet in each stitch 48 12 bpdc in each stitch 48 13 double_crochet in each st 48 14 double_crochet in 6 decrease* 42 15 bpdc 5 decrease* 36 16 double_crochet in each stitch 36 **start stuffing and stuff as you go** 17 double_crochet 4 decrease* 30 18 double_crochet 3 decrease* 24 19 double_crochet 2 decrease* 18 20 double_crochet 1 decrease* 12 21 single_crochet decrease* 6 22 fo with a long tail weave shut the remaining portion of the tail can be looped and knotted so you can hang your nest and you are all set just hang it outside and have a hornet free time do not copy or sell pattern as your own please give credit to tis but a stitch you can follow me on instagram tiktok or facebook you are free to sell finished items from this pattern 3
